function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants may have low compliance with COVID-19 mitigation measures, increasing the risk of disease spread.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission within the community and population.","Mitigation":"Provide clear and consistent communication about the importance of compliance, enforce consequences for non-compliance, and improve accessibility to resources for compliance.","Technologies":"Communication platforms, enforcement mechanisms, and accessibility tools for resources.","People":"Participants, general public, and community members.","Owner":"Public health authorities, policymakers, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Perceived clarity of COVID-19 measures may be low, leading to confusion and potential non-adherence to the guidelines.","Impact":"Confusion and potential non-compliance with COVID-19 measures, contributing to disease spread.","Mitigation":"Improve communication strategies to enhance clarity and understanding of the COVID-19 measures, provide accessible information in multiple languages, and address common misconceptions.","Technologies":"Multilingual communication tools, interactive information platforms, and misinformation detection technologies.","People":"Participants, individuals with language barriers, and those seeking accurate information.","Owner":"Health communication specialists, language interpreters, and public health educators."},{"Description":"Participants may have opportunities to violate COVID-19 mitigation measures, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of non-compliance and violation of COVID-19 measures, leading to higher disease transmission rates.","Mitigation":"Implement surveillance and monitoring systems to identify potential violations, incentivize compliance through positive reinforcement, and strengthen enforcement of measures in high-risk areas.","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, data analytics for behavior monitoring, and automated compliance tracking systems.","People":"Participants, enforcement agencies, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Law enforcement agencies, public health authorities, and technology developers."}]}
